name: epic_construction
description:
Short story about epic construction, but it was unfinished  business...

This project was made in Bitsy as part of the 'Unfinished Busines' Bitsy Jam.

I've made this game as part of the Game Design Course that I learn. If you've liked it, please also check works of my colleges:

"Game design never ends, it just stops" by boticelly (en)

История одной боли by dahuanna (rus)

lets-make-a-game-how-do-we-make-a-game by hullche (rus)

Deja-vu by Kostiantyn Dvornik
